TestCase.TestCaseObjective: The objective is to check the behaviour of compressed HTTP reception at the Consumer
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Consumer is interested (for instance) in retrieving the list of Topic expressions supported by the Producer, which will answer using compressed HTTP
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: P/S and R/R.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: MIP4SLT1_1112Both Consumer and Producer systems conform to either MIP4.0 Publish/Subscribe Exchange Pattern Specification or MIP4.0 Request/Response Exchange Pattern Specification or both.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: The test is concluded after the Consumer has received a list of Topic expressions over compressed HTTP. The list should be conformed to OASIS Topic specification.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The consumer sends a request for the list of dialect to the GetResourceProperty service of the producer. Requested property is : <rp:GetResourceProperty> b2:TopicExpression </rp:GetResourceProperty>
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The Producer receives a valid request for resource properties using b2:TopicExpression

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Producer sends the topic expressions it supports (over compressed HTTP).
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumer receives the requested list of topic expressions.
